sections.title: Business Combinations
sections.description: Checklist for presentation and disclosure requirements under IFRS 3.

items.question: Has the entity disclosed the name of the acquiree for each business combination during the period?
Has the entity provided a description of the acquiree for each business combination during the period?
Has the entity disclosed the acquisition date for each business combination during the period?
Has the entity disclosed the percentage of voting equity interests acquired in each business combination?
Has the entity explained the primary reasons for each business combination and how control was obtained?
Has the entity described the factors that make up the goodwill recognised (e.g., expected synergies, unrecognised intangibles or other factors)?
Has the entity disclosed the acquisition-date fair value of the total consideration transferred?
Has the entity disclosed the acquisition-date fair value of cash transferred?
Has the entity disclosed the acquisition-date fair value of other tangible or intangible assets transferred?
Has the entity disclosed the acquisition-date fair value of liabilities incurred (e.g., contingent consideration)?
Has the entity disclosed the acquisition-date fair value of equity interests issued or issuable, and how those were measured?
Has the entity disclosed the amount recognised for each contingent consideration arrangement at the acquisition date?
Has the entity described each contingent consideration arrangement and the basis for determining payment?
Has the entity estimated the range of undiscounted outcomes for contingent consideration or, if not, disclosed that fact and the reasons?
If the maximum contingent consideration payment is unlimited, has the entity disclosed that fact?
Has the entity disclosed the fair value of acquired receivables at the acquisition date?
Has the entity disclosed the gross contractual amounts receivable acquired?
Has the entity disclosed its best estimate of contractual cash flows not expected to be collected, by major class of receivable?
Has the entity disclosed the acquisition-date amounts recognised for each major class of assets acquired?
Has the entity disclosed the acquisition-date amounts recognised for each major class of liabilities assumed?
For each contingent liability recognised under IFRS 3.23, has the entity disclosed the information required by IAS 37.85?
If a contingent liability is not recognised because fair value cannot be measured reliably, has the entity disclosed the information required by IAS 37.86?
If a contingent liability is not recognised, has the entity disclosed why the liability cannot be measured reliably?
Has the entity disclosed the amount of goodwill expected to be deductible for tax purposes?
Has the entity described each transaction recognised separately under IFRS 3.51?
Has the entity disclosed how the acquirer accounted for each separately recognised transaction?
Has the entity disclosed the amounts recognised for each separately identified transaction and the line items in which they appear?
For transactions that settle a pre-existing relationship, has the entity disclosed the method used to determine the settlement amount?
Has the entity disclosed the total amount of acquisition-related costs?
Has the entity disclosed the amount of acquisition-related costs recognised as an expense?
Has the entity disclosed the line item(s) in the statement of comprehensive income where acquisition-related costs are recognised?
Has the entity disclosed the amount of issue costs not recognised as an expense?
Has the entity explained the treatment of issue costs not recognised as an expense?
In a bargain purchase, has the entity disclosed the amount of any gain recognised?
In a bargain purchase, has the entity disclosed the line item in which the gain is recognised?
In a bargain purchase, has the entity explained why the transaction resulted in a gain?
For non-controlling interests held at acquisition, has the entity disclosed the amount recognised and the measurement basis?
For any non-controlling interest measured at fair value, has the entity disclosed the valuation techniques and significant inputs used?
In a staged acquisition, has the entity disclosed the acquisition-date fair value of equity interests held immediately before the final acquisition?
In a staged acquisition, has the entity disclosed any gain or loss from remeasuring the prior interest to fair value and the line item where it is recognised?
Has the entity disclosed the acquiree’s revenue in the consolidated statement of comprehensive income since acquisition?
Has the entity disclosed the acquiree’s profit or loss in the consolidated statement of comprehensive income since acquisition?
If revenue or profit or loss since acquisition is impracticable to disclose, has the entity stated that fact and explained why?
Has the entity disclosed combined-entity revenue as if all combinations occurred at the start of the period?
Has the entity disclosed combined-entity profit or loss as if all combinations occurred at the start of the period?
If combined-entity revenue or profit or loss is impracticable to disclose, has the entity stated that fact and explained why?
If acquisition accounting is incomplete at authorization date, has the entity disclosed which disclosures could not be made?
If acquisition accounting is incomplete at authorization date, has the entity explained why those disclosures could not be made?
Has the entity disclosed the reasons why initial acquisition accounting is incomplete for particular items?
Has the entity identified which assets, liabilities, equity interests or consideration items have provisional amounts?
Has the entity disclosed the nature and amount of any measurement-period adjustments recognised during the period?
For post-acquisition periods, has the entity disclosed changes in recognised contingent consideration amounts, including differences on settlement?
For post-acquisition periods, has the entity disclosed changes in the range of undiscounted outcomes and the reasons for those changes?
For post-acquisition periods, has the entity disclosed the valuation techniques and key model inputs used for contingent consideration?
For contingent liabilities recognised in a business combination, has the entity disclosed the information required by IAS 37.84 and 37.85 for each provision?
Has the entity reconciled the gross carrying amount of goodwill at the beginning of the period?
Has the entity disclosed additional goodwill recognised during the period (excluding amounts in disposal groups held for sale)?
Has the entity disclosed adjustments from subsequent recognition of deferred tax assets during the period?
Has the entity disclosed goodwill included in disposal groups held for sale and goodwill derecognised during the period?
Has the entity disclosed impairment losses on goodwill recognised during the period?
Has the entity disclosed net exchange rate differences on goodwill during the period?
Has the entity disclosed any other changes in the carrying amount of goodwill during the period?
Has the entity reconciled the gross carrying amount and accumulated impairment losses of goodwill at the end of the period?
Has the entity disclosed the amount of any gain or loss relating to identifiable assets acquired or liabilities assumed?
Has the entity explained any gain or loss of such size or nature that disclosure is relevant to understanding the combined entity’s financial statements?
